info.name: Google Metroid
info.description: This is a Metroid inspired theme for the Google home page and Google search results page.
info.additionalInfo:
12-21-2017: Fixed Google logo showing distorted and really big

12-19-2017: Changed the caret color in the Google search box to red (for chrome and firefox). Made the recent searches appear in goldenrod yellow.

12-18-2017: Uploaded new style
